document.full_text: pan-arab broadcasters who played a key role reporting arab uprisings in tunisia and egypt are helping dynastic rulers police the gates of the gulf to stop the revolts from spreading on their patch, analysts say.
document.title: gulf broadcasters find red line in uprisings
lines_and_colors: pan-arab broadcasters who played a key role reporting arab uprisings in tunisia and egypt are helping dynastic rulers police the gates of the gulf to stop the revolts from spreading on their patch, analysts say.
